veryhappy.motivation: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you think.
You are the best. You can do it.
You are a good reason to be happy.

happy.motivation: Study hard. Do good and the good life will follow.
You are not here to be average. You are here to be awesome. Keep going!
One day, you will say, you made it.

okay.motivation: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
If it’s important to you, you’ll find a way. If not, you’ll find an excuse.

okay.motivated: Great things never come from comfort zones.

stressed.motivation: It always seems impossible until it's done.
The expert in everything was once a beginner.
Don’t talk, just act. Don’t say, just show. Don’t promise, just prove.

verystressed.motivation: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
